dickman_survey_10.Description: I often say and do things without considering the consequences.

dickman_survey_11.Description: I frequently make appointments without thinking about whether I will be able to keep them.

dickman_survey_12.Description: I am uncomfortable when l have to make up my mind rapidly.

dickman_survey_13.Description: I don't like to do things quickly, even when I am doing something that is not very difficult.

dickman_survey_14.Description: I frequently buy things without thinking about whether or not I can really afford them.

dickman_survey_15.Description: I am good at careful reasoning.

dickman_survey_16.Description: I like to take part in really fast-paced conversations, where you don't have much time to think before you speak.

dickman_survey_17.Description: I like sports and games in which you have to choose your next move very quickly.

dickman_survey_18.Description: Many times the plans I make don't work out because I havent gone over them carefully enough in advance.

dickman_survey_19.Description: I often get into trouble because I don't think before I act.

dickman_survey_2.Description: Often, I don't spend enough time thinking over a situation before I act.

dickman_survey_20.Description: Most of the time, I can put my thoughts into words very rapidly.

dickman_survey_21.Description: People have admired me because I can think quickly.

dickman_survey_22.Description: I will often say whatever comes into my head without thinking first.

dickman_survey_23.Description: Before making any important decision, I carefully weigh the pros and cons.

dickman_survey_24.Description: I rarely get involved in projects without first considering the potential problems.

dickman_survey_3.Description: I try to avoid activities where you have to act without much time to think first.

dickman_survey_4.Description: I don't like to make decisions quickly, even simple decisions, such as choosing what to wear, or what to have for dinner.

dickman_survey_5.Description: I enjoy working out problems slowly and carefully.

dickman_survey_6.Description: I am good at taking advantage of unexpected opportunities,where you have to do something immediately or lose your chance.

dickman_survey_7.Description: I would enjoy working at a job that required me to make a lot of split-second decisions.

dickman_survey_8.Description: I often make up my mind without taking the time to consider the situation from all angles.

dickman_survey_9.Description: I have often missed out on opportunities because I couldn't make up my mind fast enough.
